metadata.title: CVE-2018-10685 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is a use-after-free in thelzma_decompress_buf function of stream.c, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.631-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1').
